turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help you with that. Are you an existing patient of Dr. Ramirez?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, I am. My name is Jane Doe, and my date of birth is 01/15/1988.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Ms. Doe. One moment while I pull up your record... Okay, I see it here. What is the reason for your visit today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need a check-up and also want to discuss some concerns about persistent fatigue. It's been going on for months now, and I'm getting worried.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand. Let me check Dr. Ramirez's availability for the next few weeks. We have an opening on October 26th at 10:00 AM, or November 2nd at 2:30 PM. Would either of those work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, those are both bad days for me. Anything earlier in October? I'd really like to see her sooner rather than later.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me see... unfortunately, those are the only two general check-up slots available for the next month with Dr. Ramirez. We do have an opening with Dr. Lee on October 18th at 9:00 AM. Would you like me to check that for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, okay, October 18th at 9:00 AM with Dr. Lee... is Dr. Lee familiar with my medical history, or will I have to explain everything from scratch?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Dr. Lee will have access to your full medical record from our system. They'll be able to review everything before your appointment. Does that time work for you then?
